body.name: AA Products Gaming Chair High Back Ergonomic Computer Racing Chair Adjustable Office Chair with Footrest, Lumbar Support Swivel Chair - Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 30 mins
features: [SUPERIOR QUALITY] Professional Racing Chair made of PVC Leather, High density shaping sponge, Anti-Abrasion and More comfortable. Standard 3-Class gas lifter, Adjustable to fit your need. 360 Degree swivel and Multi-direction Wheels. Recline function between 90-150 Degree.

[GAMING CHAIR DIMENSIONS] The overall dimensions of the Computer chair is 21.6'' x 20'' x 51'' - 55''.Size of Backrest: 18" W X 33.6" H, Size of Seat: 21.4'' W x 20'' L, Seat adjustable height: 17.7'' ~ 21.7''. The Maximum weight capacity: 300 Lbs.

[EXTRA COMFORT] Our brand new High back Gaming Chair with a unique appearance and thickly cushioned for maximum comfort. Ergonomically designed Racing Computer Chair provides removable Headrest pillow and lumbar support.Adjustable Footrest.More comfortable, Skin-friendly and wear-resisting.

[MULTI-PURPOSE OFFICE CHAIR] This Video Game Computer Chair with commercial gas lift, You can adjust the comfortable angle of pneumatic control handle. Use this swivel chair as Ergonomic Office Chair, Gaming Chair, Racing Chair and so on.

[ONE YEAR WARRANTY] If you're not satisfied with the Computer Chair, Please contact us. We will take care of the rest and offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Your order is now RISK-FREE! ''Add to Cart'' Now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most bang for the buck!
reviews.reviewText: It came quickly in the mail within four days. it only took us 30 minutes to assemble it and I didn’t even need the instructions - come on it’s a chair with only a few pieces to assemble lol and it was very easy to follow the directions if you needed to refer back. Of course I am kind of a handy guy with tools, but even if you have a little bit of experience you shouldn’t have a problem putting this chair together there’s really not that many pieces to assemble. I’ve seen people write some reviews saying that they took two hours to figure it out and that’s just ridiculous. It’s really comfortable and fun to use. It has a lot of options like recline, extra padding for lumbar support and neck support and it’s, fully adjustable, and very well-made, and most importantly priced fairly. I’ve seen chairs go for way more and this one is just as good.Im going to get another for office at my garage. It’s so sporty looking! I keep seeing people say this thing breaks? Well, I’m 220lbs and five feet eleven and I didn’t break the foot rest like these other people who must be slam dancing in the chair all night lol come on guys this is a 200 dollar middle of the road chair that’s giving you a lot of nice options and features, AND for a fair price! This isn’t a premium office chair you’ll find in a law firm, bank, or executives conference room, those chairs are usually 1000 dollars folks. I’m also buying the matching desk they make too right after I’m done posting this review. Because I’ve bought many office chairs over the years and I’m having the most fun with this one. And yes, this chair is best fitted for certain “frame types” let’s say, but I’m no small guy and I take care of my stuff that I buy and I’m not rough with it. It’s great for gaming for a few hours and he’ll yeah as well as kicking back the recline feature and talking on the phone lol I’m so buying another chair for my office at the garage and a desk too! I wanna look cool over there and this chair screams racing! I don’t care if it lasts only a few years, or maybe it will be last more since I take good care of things, I’m not using it to go on a ship into outer space with the dam thing! I don’t need a five hundred dollar elite brand chair for my every day work. A buddy of mine has the same chair in his garage with a rough edged floor, grease, and chemicals and he’s had his chair a whole year beating on it and it never broke, I don’t know what these people are doing with the chair but they can’t be treating them correctly. So pound for pound and option for option, this was the best deal going. And anyone who says this chair is less then four stars surely doesn’t know what there talking about. I sat on this chair six hours today and the padding and pillows were satisfactory. Of course my leg was a bit sore because heck, nobody should sit for that long on any chair!lol But for the money, and the design, I think this chair is just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It won't last long
reviews.reviewText: It has only been like half a year of the purchase and it already broke, it looks like one of the holes where the wheels go was damaged, and bcz of that one breaking the chair lost all it's balance, and it won't stand without it. It was cool at first but now I have no use for it, it was a total loss of money and this ain't cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews of this chair, I can see where people don't like the instructions. Personally, I don't like how they want you to put the arms on at the end. I saw a lot of complaints at it breaking immediately but I put mine through the tests of reclining and a pressure test on the leg rests. TBH, I really think most of the broken chairs are a result of poor instructions and/or poor user assembly. The chair is comfortable outside of what seems to be a bit of a distance on the arms from the chair even at the closest setting, you do have to remove at least one of your arms from the arm rests in order to type but thats really about it.The leg/foot rest is exactly what it is. Somewhere below I read that theres a fatal flaw on the leg/foot rest but it wasn't clear how they where using it. They made it seem that they tried to stand on it (don't). It's just a leg/foot rest thats it, could it be a bit more comfortable, yeah a little.Overall, the chair is a great piece for it's price. I think a lot of negative reviews are trying to make comparisons to chairs made by Secret Labs or Respawn that are almost $100 more. I'm quite fond of this chair, I've had to go back and fix how I put it together a couple of times but that is because the items aren't marked for inside or outside (arms) or which side of the leg/foot rest should be used. If you're looking for a chair under $200 and has lambar support, this is a good one even for its price. You can adjust the lambar support to where it feels best for you.Ultimately, this is a review so, you decide if you want it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Advertized
reviews.reviewText: I gave it 5 starts for gaming though I am not a gamer. I do have a home office and usually am in the chair for 8-10 hours a day. I have "broken" multiple office chairs over the years and this was suggested to me by a friend. It is comfortable, adjustable and works for me perfectly so far. I have only had it a few weeks but love the look and feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Should've listned to more of the reviews..
reviews.reviewText: It was easy enough to assemble, but it was missing a few screws.. I made it work but it was noticeable in the arm rests right away but I made due. Soon later the armrest would swivel causing you to have to pop them in or out which is a strange feature. After only a couple months of use the back adjusting mechanism broke, which i was able to deal with until the back had zero support. It was like a floppy pool noodle either falling forward or backward. This chair wasn't cheap...But the quality of the welding was incredibly cheap.. My partner and I are average height and weight, absolutely no reason for this to fall apart on us so quickly... I threw away the back and have been using my computer stool till i can afford a decent gaming chair....at least the leg rest still works... My cat likes it... I just put a towel on my computer stool >.<Save your money and do your homework.Ive been using it backless longer then having a back on it... It literally pains me to this day..I knew it wasn't gonna last forever but, to start falling apart in a few months is absolutely absurd and frustrating. I honestly felt/ feel helpless with this misfortune purchase...I like(d) the height of it...Stuck with this stool cause I fell a fool u.u

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've had it for a couple months now and there's a crack in the left armrest rubber. Overall 5 for design and style, comfort. But dropped 2 star due to this durability issue. Should be a year or so before things start to fall apart. Do not buy if looking for long term satisfaction.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This gaming chair is just what I needed. Very comfortable and a great design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely chair but poor assembly instructions
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately the instructions had some errors for example they referred to screw (N) however N was the head rest so had to eliminate where other screws would go to determine which to use. Also when connecting the arm, the instructions had the screws the wrong way round which resulted in some damage to the arm rest where the screws poked through. Disappointing as I paid a lot for a chair that is now damaged. Other than the assembly issues, the chair itself is great. It's very sturdy and I love the footrest and recline functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Comfy and you’ll need to chill….
reviews.reviewText: After the annoying process of reading the rough instructions, the chair makes you glad you brought it. Wonderful and yet to have back pain as I had in my previous office chair.UPDATE : someone help me out of this thing because I’m not happy unless my cheeks are firmly planted on this chair. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In summary, thank god for Amazon customer service as their customer service does not seem to respond.Very hard to assemble and confusing instructions but got over it. The chair, unfortunately, slides down. I don't know if it is underspec'd gas lift or what but it is not great. And comfort wise, it's fine.Stay away from it.
